prompt:
Now, Listen to me:
基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：设计 18 周的课程大纲,每周 3 学时

Your answer should be in Chinese, using the Markdown format for layout.
The instructions for the attachments uploaded:
- Adobe Premiere Pro CC For Dummies, was published on 2022. (It can be cite this paper as Carucci, 2022 on your answer). 
- Adobe premiere pro classroom in a book: The official training workbook from adobe, was published on 2022. (It can be cite this paper as Jago, 2022 on your answer). 
- Beginners guide to, (It can be cite this paper as Williams on your answer).
response: 转眼间，你和 Kimi 的这个对话已经超过了 20 万字。Kimi 在不断提升自己对话最大长度，但现在只能麻烦你开启一个新会话。期待与你再相遇！
quection: 基于对书中主题和讨论的理解, 请从原文提取不同有利的方法或证据回答一下问题：设计 18 周的课程大纲,每周 3 学时
